name: EASYPEASY Scarf
description: Der EASYPEASY Scarf ist ein schlichtes Dreieckstuch, dass sich aufgrund seiner Größe auch hervorragend als Schal für kühlere Tage eignet.
full_text: The EASYPEASY Scarf is a simple triangular scarf that, due to its size, is also ideal as a scarf for cooler days. As the name suggests, the EASYPEASY Scarf is super easy to knit and therefore perfect for beginners. The shawl is knitted crosswise, i.e. starting at the right tip, increasing to the widest point, the middle tip, then decreasing until the left tip is reached. Techniques used: yarn overs, stitches crossed left and right, decreases inclined to the left. Size Length: approx. 220 cm Width (middle tip): approx. 66 cm Measured after washing and stretching. The size of the scarf is variable; depending on your preference, it can also be knitted larger or smaller. Simply knit fewer or more increases until the middle. Stitch sample stockinette stitch with 'Compatible Cashmere' and needle size 3.5 mm: 22 sts x 35 rows = 10 x 10 cm (measured washed). Stockinette stitch with 'Fine Fine Merino' + 'Baby Alpaca Loves Silk' and needle size 4.0 mm: 19 sts x 27 rows = 10 x 10 cm (measured washed). The stitch sample does not have to fit exactly, it serves more as a guide. Needles circular knitting needle 3.5 - 4.0 mm (60 - 80 cm), depending on the yarn used. Other material Sewing needle, stitch marker if necessary Yarn 250 g 'Compatible Cashmere' from Knitting for Olive (100% cashmere; LL 187 m/25 g), in the title photo in the color Gray Lamb, knitted double-thread with Nd 3.5 mm. or for a slightly 'fluffier' version with: 150 g of 'Essentials Fine Fine Merino' from Rico Design (100% virgin wool; LL 200 m/50 g), in the photo above in color 09 together with 75 g of 'Essentials Baby Alpaca Loves Silk' from Rico Design (75% alpaca, 25% silk; 200 m/25 g), here color. 02 knitted with Nd 4 mm. Numerous other yarns or yarn combinations are possible for the cloth, here are a few more ideas: 150 g 'Como' from Lamana (100% virgin wool; LL 120 m/25 g) knitted in one thread with Nd 3.5 - 4 mm. 150 g 'Cashmere 6/28' from Pascuali (100% cashmere; LL 112 m/25 g) single thread knitted with needle thread 3.5 mm. 100 g 'Milano' from Lamana (90% virgin wool, 10% cashmere; LL 180 m / 25 g) knitted together with 75 g 'Premia' from Lamana (60% mohair, 40% silk; 300 m / 25 g) with needle thread 3.5 - 4 mm.
